TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContractDescription extends System.Object

summary.span: 描述 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 合約，指定端點與外界溝通的內容。

span.span: Describes a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) contract that specifies what an endpoint communicates to the outside world.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WCF 合約是作業的集合，指定端點給外界進行通訊。A WCF contract is a collection of operations that specifies what the endpoint communicates to the outside world. 每個作業都是訊息交換。Each operation is a message exchange. 例如，一個要求訊息和一個關聯的回覆訊息即形成一個要求/回覆訊息交換。For example, a request message and an associated reply message form a request/reply message exchange. A物件用來描述 WCF 合約和其作業。A object is used to describe WCF contracts and their operations. 在 中，每個合約作業都有對應的 ，描述屬於合約內各個作業的各個部分，例如作業是單向作業或要求/回覆作業。Within a , each contract operation has a corresponding that describes aspects of the each operation that is part of the contract, such as whether the operation is one-way or request/reply. 每個 也會使用 來描述組成作業的訊息。Each also describes the messages that make up the operation using a . 包含使用程式設計模型定義合約之介面的參考。 contains a reference to an interface that defines the contract using the programming model. 這個介面標示為 ，其對應至端點作業的方法標示為 。This interface is marked with and its methods that correspond to endpoint operations are marked with the . A*雙工*合約會定義作業的下列邏輯的組合：A *duplex* contract defines the following logical sets of operations: - 為用戶端公開以進行呼叫的服務的組合。A set that the service exposes for the client to call. - 為服務公開以進行呼叫的用戶端的組合。A set that the client exposes for the service to call. 定義雙工合約的程式設計模型是將各組合分隔到不同的介面中，並將屬性套用至各個介面。The programming model for defining a duplex contract is to split each set in a separate interface and apply attributes to each interface. 在這種情況中， 會包含各個介面的參考，將它們組成一個雙工合約。In this case, contains a reference to each of the interfaces that groups them into one duplex contract. 類似繫結，每個合約都有 和 ，如此便可以在服務的中繼資料中唯一識別各個合約。Similar to bindings, each contract has a and that uniquely identify it in the metadata of the service. ## Examples 下列範例會示範一些建立或擷取 物件的方法。The following example shows a number of ways to create or retrieve a object. 然後它會顯示儲存在 物件中的各種不同資訊。It then displays the various pieces of information that are stored in the object. [!code-csharp[S_UE_ContractDescription#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_contractdescription/cs/calculatorservice.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ContractDescription#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_contractdescription/vb/calculatorservice.vb#0)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出合約是否需要工作階段。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a session is required by the contract.

value.span: ，指定合約所需要或支援的可靠工作階段支援。

span.span: The that specifies the support for reliable sessions that a contract requires or supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可靠工作階段是一種相互關聯的一組兩個或多個端點之間交換的訊息 (使用[WS-ReliableMessaging](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96680)規格) 以提供連線可靠性保證。A reliable session is a way of correlating a set of messages exchanged between two or more endpoints (using the [WS-ReliableMessaging](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96680) specification) to provide assurances of the reliability of the connection. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ContractDescription#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_contractdescription/cs/calculatorservice.cs#12)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ContractDescription#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_contractdescription/vb/calculatorservice.vb#12)]
